message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
